translation.en: Let's make that money.
What have you guys been eating?
Score!
Shh!
Gah… this isn't what it looks like. I'm only here for your poop.
translation.de: Alles gut. Ich bin nur wegen eurer Kacke hier.

translation.en: [chuckles] I mean, I'm here for the mushrooms in your poop.
translation.de: Wegen der Pilze in eurer Kacke.

translation.en: Yeah, that doesn't sound any better.
Catch!
Sorry I can't stay for dinner.
translation.de: Ich kann nicht zum Essen bleiben.

translation.en: Come on, who throws somebody at somebody?
translation.de: Kommt schon, wer bewirft mit Leuten?

translation.en: Whoa!
Large rats.
Dirty hands, filthy rich.
Hurry up, man.
I can't do business until you deliver the goods.
Tyson, you're in for a treat, you lucky wizard.
Freshly tracked.
Ah, it better be.
My dupe spell is useless without multiplying mushrooms.
translation.de: Ohne Vielfachpilze ist mein Duplikatszauber nutzlos.

translation.en: Oh, yeah, that's the good stuff right there.
Hurry up, man. You don't wanna get busted for doing magic in public.
translation.de: Los, Mann. Keine Magie in der Öffentlichkeit.

translation.en: One more second.
All right! Double your pleasure.
You, get to Tribeca.
You, Soho. And get my money back before you disappear this time!
translation.de: Du, Soho. Und bringt Geld, bevor ihr verschwindet.

translation.en: Oh, look at this little guy.
How's about a mini-dog, Spellbound? On the house.
translation.de: Wie wäre ein Mini-Dog? Aufs Haus.

translation.en: Uh… I don't eat magic.
You may be half-sized, but you charge full price. You hear me?
translation.de: Voller Preis, auch wenn nur halbgroß. Kapiert?

translation.en: Getting partners was the best business decision I ever made.
You got someone watching your back, kid?
Ha! You volunteering?
Nah, I'm not trying to buddy up with somebody on the wrong side of The Pie Maker.
translation.de: Nein, ich will keine Freunde, die die Kuchenbäckerin verärgern.

translation.en: Who cares about that old witch?
Her bakers are searching for you, kid.
She wants you that bad, you must've really screwed up tracking something for her.
translation.de: Sie ist so besessen, du musst was echt verbockt haben.

translation.en: It's fine. I'm close to finding a Fugu Rose.
translation.de: Alles gut. Bald habe ich eine Fugu-Rose.

translation.en: Whoa. That rose is worth serious money, kid. You found one?
translation.de: Wow. Diese Rose ist echtes Geld wert. Du fandest eine?

translation.en: I just need help to track the last step.
Once I get that, ha!
All my debts are cleared and I'm set.
Yeah, except you'll still be stinky,
friendless, and, oh yeah, not magic.
translation.de: bist ohne Freunde und, oh ja, Magie.

translation.en: Hygiene's a scam, friends are a scam, and, oh yeah, magic is a scam.
translation.de: Hygiene ist Schwindel, Freunde auch, und Magie genauso.

translation.en: Call it what you want, kid, but my magic buddies are making me rich.
translation.de: Wie du meinst, aber meine Zauberkumpel machen mich reich.

translation.en: Hey-hey, guys.
I was just on my way to see you--
Hey, where were you?
You see that little hot dog guy down the block?
You have to try one of his dogs.
-[grunts] -[baker] We searched. No magic on him.
Daniel, my boy.
I always forget how cute your place is, Pie Maker.
translation.de: Ich vergesse immer, wie süß dein Laden ist.

translation.en: The pies, the… curtains, the cyclops henchmen.
translation.de: Die Torten, die Vorhänge, die Zyklopen-Handlanger.

translation.en: I didn't become the most wicked witch of New York
translation.de: Ich wurde nicht die boshafteste Hexe New Yorks

translation.en: by having low-life spell Trackers fail me.
My clients expect the best magical ingredients.
translation.de: Meine Kunden erwarten die besten magischen Zutaten,

translation.en: Ingredients you were supposed to deliver.
Where are my gnome whiskers?
I was gonna get them to you, I swear!
But the Bureau sicced a dowser on me, I had to ditch 'em.
translation.de: aber das Amt suchte mich mit einem Rutengänger.

translation.en: I have a plan.
The magic world knows my pies have the most dangerous ingredients.
translation.de: Die Zauberwelt weiß, meine Kuchen haben die gefährlichsten Zutaten,

translation.en: Ingredients you promised to find me and failed.
translation.de: die du mir leider nicht liefertest.

translation.en: That's fair, but I'm tracking something big for you.
translation.de: Ok, ich suche was Großes für dich.

translation.en: Yes, for me, because you owe me.
translation.de: Ja, für mich, weil du mir was schuldest.

translation.en: You're my Tracker now.
You will do nothing
translation.de: Du suchst nur noch illegale Zutaten,

translation.en: but find every little illegal ingredient I need for my magic pies.
translation.de: Du suchst nur noch illegale Zutaten, die ich für meine Zauberkuchen brauche.

translation.en: I told you, the Bureau heat on me has been intense,
translation.de: Das Amt ist hinter mir her,

translation.en: but when I can track again, I'll make it up to you. It's all about you.
translation.de: aber bald kann ich wieder für dich suchen. Nur für dich.

translation.en: Uh-uh-uh. You're not telling me the truth.
translation.de: Na. Du sagst mir nicht die Wahrheit.

translation.en: I haven't done any tracking at all, I swear.
Bring out…
…The Beast.
Ah… a pig?
Hey! Come on.
[giggling] Get this thing off of me. It tickles, but in a scary way.
translation.de: Nehmt das Ding weg! Es kitzelt, aber auf gruselige Weise.

translation.en: [Pie Maker] Don't struggle.
The pig sniffer is powerful enough to sense any magic from a hundred yards away.
translation.de: Der Schweineschnüffler kann Magie aus 100 Metern Entfernung riechen.

translation.en: Hey, what the--
Ogre mushrooms.
Fresh.
Impressive work.
Get his eye-patch ready.
This isn't necessary!
Now, which are you, Daniel?
A heart? Oh, no, no, no.
You clearly think you're a star.
translation.de: Du hältst dich für einen Star.

translation.en: I could get you a Fugu Rose!
Impossible.
No one's seen a Fugu Rose in years.
translation.de: Seit Jahren sah man keine Fugu-Rose.

translation.en: They're priceless.
I know where one is.
My best Trackers couldn't do that. No way you could, silly boy.
translation.de: Meine besten Aufspürer finden keine. Du erst recht nicht, Dummerchen.

translation.en: Give me 24 hours and it's yours, if you erase all my debt.
translation.de: In 24 Stunden hast du eine und tilgst meine Schuld.

translation.en: Well, dear, we have a deal.
translation.de: Nun, Lieber, wir haben einen Deal.

translation.en: [Pie Maker] You better not disappoint me again,
because you won't like what this spell will do to you.
Not one bit.
Great. Heh. You'll be seeing me soon.
There is still the little matter of you lying to me, though.
translation.de: Es gibt noch die Kleinigkeit, dass du mich anlogst.

translation.en: -Wait! We have a deal. -[Pie Maker chuckles evilly]
My dear,
you can still find the Rose with one eye.
translation.de: du kannst die Rose noch mit einem Auge finden.

translation.en: No! That activates the oven to full power.
translation.de: Nein! Das stellt den Ofen auf volle Leistung.

translation.en: Turn off the oven, you buffoon!
Ha! What are you doing?
[Daniel] You're just the kind of help I've been looking for.
See you lovebirds in 24 hours.
[Pie Maker] I'll take both your eyes for that!
translation.de: Dafür wirst du beide Augen los.

translation.en: -[tires screeching] -Whoa, hey!
Gotta catch my breath.
-You said it. -[screams]
Did you just talk?
Hey, thanks for saving my bacon, man. She is awful.
translation.de: Danke fürs Retten. Sie ist schlimm.

translation.en: She has a place full of food, never gives me a crumb.
translation.de: Sie gibt mir nicht mal Krümel.

translation.en: So, you smell magic and talk.
translation.de: Du riechst also Magie und redest.

translation.en: Any other tricks I should know about? You turn into a car or something?
translation.de: Sonst noch Tricks? Wirst du ein Auto oder so?

translation.en: Oh, you done it now. How did you know I turn into a car?
translation.de: Oh, wow. Woher wusstest du, dass ich ein Auto werde?

translation.en: I'm just playing. I can't turn into a car. That'd be stupid.
translation.de: Scherz. Ich werde kein Auto. Das wäre dumm.

translation.en: You're stupid. Aw, it's a little bit endearing, though.
translation.de: Du bist dumm. Aber es ist niedlich.

translation.en: Well, thanks again, I owe you. All right. I'm out. Peace.
translation.de: Danke noch mal, hast was gut. Ok. Ich haue ab. Peace.

translation.en: Throwing up a, "Peace, I'm out" sign, you just can't tell 'cause I have a hoof.
translation.de: Wegen meiner Hufen erkennst du das Peace-Zeichen nicht.

translation.en: Uh-huh. You do owe me. And I have a way you can repay me right now.
translation.de: Du schuldest mir was. Du kannst es sofort einlösen.

translation.en: I-I-I-I-I'm not going anywhere with any magician ever again.
translation.de: Ich gehe nie wieder mit einem Zauberer.

translation.en: Oh, well, you're in luck. I'm not a magician, I'm a Tracker.
translation.de: Du hast Glück. Ich bin Aufspürer, kein Zauberer.

translation.en: -I just sell magical ingredients. -Uh-huh. Cool story, bruh.
Wait, I know where a Fugu Rose is-- Ish.
translation.de: Warte, ich weiß, wo eine Fugu-Rose ist…

translation.en: I don't know exactly where, so I need your magic smelling skills to get me to the finish.
translation.de: Na ja, nicht ganz, dafür brauche ich deine Riechkünste.

translation.en: Pie Maker wanted to take your eye before you wrecked her shop,
translation.de: Sie wollte dir vor der Verwüstung ein Auge nehmen,

translation.en: what'd you think she's gonna want now? A spleen?
Oh, please. She'll be so happy when she gets the Rose, she won't even care.
translation.de: Ach, das ist ihr egal, wenn sie die Rose hat.

translation.en: The Rose'll clear all my debts to her, and then some.
translation.de: Die Rose begleicht alles bei ihr.

translation.en: So, you'll walk away.
Oh, good for you. What's in it for me?
translation.de: Schön für dich. Was habe ich davon?

translation.en: If you help me get this Rose,
I promise I won't give it to her unless she sets you free.
translation.de: gebe ich ihr die Rose erst, wenn sie dich freilässt.

translation.en: Out on my own. Love it. What else?
translation.de: Ja. Ich liebe es. Was noch?

translation.en: We can get pizza on the way.
[chuckling] Yes, I am very in.
Here, just hoof-pump it, bruh.
What do I call you anyways? Piggy?
Oh, I get it. "Piggy." Because I'm a pig.
translation.de: Klar. "Schweini." Weil ich ein Schwein bin.

translation.en: Because all pigs look alike to you.
My name is Hoagie. Not "Pig," not "Piggy," not "Oinkie," just "Hoagie."
Hoagie, I was kidding.
[Hoagie] Just for that "Piggy" crack, I'm gonna pick the pizza.
translation.de: Ok. Für das "Schweini" suche ich die Pizza aus.

translation.en: Good call on the veggie pizza.
Yeah, I don't know what it is, but I just don't feel right eating pepperoni anymore.
translation.de: Keine Ahnung, wieso, aber ich esse ungern Salami.

translation.en: What's the deal with this Albright place?
I've tracked the Fugu Rose for a long time. The search led me here.
translation.de: Ich verfolge die Rose schon lange. Bis hierher.

translation.en: A soap factory.
It's more than a soap factory.
I've snuck a bunch of times. It's in there. Somewhere.
translation.de: Ich war schon drin. Sie ist da.

translation.en: How do you know that? You don't have my nose for this.
translation.de: Woher weißt du das? Du hast nicht meine Nase.

translation.en: It's called planning, dummy.
Oh, look at me.
I got my hands so I can type and Wiki stuff and think I'm sooo great.
translation.de: Ich habe meine Hände zum Tippen und Wiki-Kram, ich bin super.

translation.en: Hoagie, keep quiet and stay loose. Loose? What do you mean?
translation.de: -Hoagie, bleib ruhig und locker. -Locker? Was meinst du?

translation.en: Whoa, dude, that is not cool.
I'm already down an eye, you trying to break a leg too?
translation.de: Soll ich nach dem Auge auch ein Bein verlieren?

translation.en: [Daniel sighs] I did say stay loose.
[Hoagie] So sorry, I haven't exactly been keeping up with my yoga.
There's magic all over the place in here,
but I'm getting one really strong scent.
translation.de: aber ein Duft ist sehr stark.

translation.en: [Daniel] I knew it. It's this lab, right?
translation.de: Ich wusste es. Dieses Labor, oder?

translation.en: No, the strongest whiff of magic is…
translation.de: Nein, der stärkste Hauch von Magie ist…

translation.en: There! Ta-da!
Oh, great, you're defective. I literally just fed you.
translation.de: Oh, toll, du bist defekt. Ich fütterte dich erst.

translation.en: Because I'm a pig. Because pigs love to eat.
translation.de: Ich bin ein Schwein. Die fressen nur.

translation.en: The alchemist triad? Bingo.
I wonder what it could be.
Not that one either.
Are you sure you did it right?
Uh… I don't even think there's any kind of magic in here. This is nothing but a dusty old vending machine.
translation.de: Hier gibt's keine Magie. Nur ein staubiger alter Automat.

translation.en: My nose doesn't lie.
Your nose is just trying to get a free Twinkie. Oh, I see. That's how it's gonna be.
translation.de: -Deine Nase will einen Riegel. -Oh, ich verstehe. So läuft das.

translation.en: [Daniel] I'll give 'em credit. This was a great hiding place.
translation.de: Das muss man ihnen lassen. Ein tolles Versteck.

translation.en: Oh, this room reeks of magic.
translation.de: Oh, dieser Raum stinkt nach Magie.

translation.en: It's itching the inside of my brain.
Get it together, Hoagie. We're on the clock.
Only a few hours until my deal runs out.
Where'd you go?
[in evil voice] There is no Hoagie, only King of the Squid People.
translation.de: Es gibt keinen Hoagie, nur den König der Tintenfische.

translation.en: Do squid things for me.
Get down off the tentacore.
Chill. I'm just having a little fun.
I'll chill when we get the Rose. -Don't touch anything. -Hmm.
translation.de: Ich chille, wenn wir die Rose haben. Nichts anfassen.

translation.en: There's no telling what's magically booby-trapped in here.
[gasps] There it is.
That's the Fugu Rose? Just grab some flowers and split.
translation.de: Das ist die Fugu-Rose? Schnapp dir welche.

translation.en: This whole place was built around this to protect it.
translation.de: Das alles wurde zum Schutz gebaut.

translation.en: Does that give you any idea of how powerful it is?
One rose on this bush can be used to extend life by decades,
translation.de: Eine Rose verlängert das Leben um Jahrzehnte,

translation.en: but touching any of the others brings instant, painful death.
translation.de: aber berührt man eine andere, stirbt man qualvoll.

translation.en: Oh, I get your plan now. You mistook me for a guinea pig.
translation.de: Oh, jetzt verstehe ich. Ich bin dein Versuchskaninchen.

translation.en: -No, I-- -[squeals]
[screaming] A little help!
This is why you don't touch anything.
Oh, no. I'm too young to become pepperoni! Immune to stun spells. That's real--
translation.de: -Oh nein. Ich bin zu jung für Salami. -Immun gegen Betäubungszauber. Das ist…

translation.en: Score!
Let's get that rose and get out.
Heaven help me, it tastes so good!
translation.de: Meine Güte, es schmeckt so gut.

translation.en: -Hoagie… get me… the sword… now. -[thumping]
-[thumping continues] -This… genuinely… hurts.
[Hoagie] I've got the sword!
Daniel! You want me? Come and get me, land sushi.
translation.de: Daniel! Du willst mich? Komm doch, Land-Sushi.

translation.en: Oh, man, did you just touch that rose? Oh, I bet you're feeling stupid now.
translation.de: Mann, hast du die Rose angefasst? Ich wette, du fühlst dich jetzt dumm.

translation.en: Daniel! Tell me you're okay.
Didn't I say not to touch anything?!
translation.de: Sagte ich nicht, nichts zu berühren?

translation.en: You almost got me killed!
No, I saved you.
From a thing you brought to life with your touching!
translation.de: Vor einem Ding, das du zum Leben erwecktest.

translation.en: Now I'm drenched in walking fish guts.
-Pfft. You're still alive. -[sighs]
You want this rose or not? Because I know which one to definitely not touch.
translation.de: Willst du die Rose? Ich weiß, welche man nicht anfasst.

translation.en: Tell me the right one to pick.
I'm trying. I'm a little fired up right now. I'm not used to facing death so many times in one day.
translation.de: Ich versuche es. Ich bin etwas nervös. Ich sehe dem Tod selten so oft ins Auge.

translation.en: Yes! Best Tracker alive.
Man, I was like 65% sure I was right. Thank goodness.
translation.de: Mann, ich war mir zu 65 % sicher. Gott sei Dank.

translation.en: Wait, what?
Uh, those were decent odds. Just take the victory lap and be happy.
translation.de: Das waren gute Chancen. Genieß einfach den Sieg.

translation.en: Come on, I got you.
Alley-oop.
-Thanks. -Good work, man.
translation.de: Danke. Gute Arbeit, Mann. Bleiben wir zusammen, als Team.

translation.en: What do you think about hanging around? We make an okay team, yeah?
translation.de: Gute Arbeit, Mann. Bleiben wir zusammen, als Team.

translation.en: Oh, so I can help you make money off of my power. What an offer.
translation.de: Damit du mit mir Kohle machst. Tolles Angebot.

translation.en: Where are you gonna go?
You're a magic talking pig. The normal world won't know what to do with you.
translation.de: Du bist ein magisches sprechendes Schwein. Das ist unnormal.

translation.en: Thanks. I'll take my chances.
Lots of better jobs out there for a pig than being your nose servant.
translation.de: Es gibt bessere Jobs als dein Nasendiener.

translation.en: Hoagie, you're right. We can make money.
translation.de: Hoagie, du hast recht. Wir verdienen Geld.

translation.en: Together. Split it 50/50.
Watch each other's backs. What'd you say?
Now you're talking. All right. I'm in.
translation.de: Schon besser. Ok. Ich bin dabei.

translation.en: Dowsers. Run for it! I swear I never touched anything.
[female dowser] By order of the Bureau of Magical Enforcement, you are both under arrest.
translation.de: Auf Anordnung des Amts für magische Durchsetzung seid ihr verhaftet.

translation.en: I do not know this guy. We are not together.
translation.de: Ich kenne diesen Typen nicht. Wir gehören nicht zusammen.

translation.en: Thanks.
